snippet: From Austin to San Angelo, a chunk of Texas that is as distinctive as the state itself.
abstract: From Austin to San Angelo, a chunk of Texas that is as distinctive as the state itself.
lead_paragraph: Thanks to smoke residue that can only have come from cooking tons of brisket and ribs over decades, the walls at Louie Mueller Barbecue in Taylor, Tex., are an indescribable shade of grayish-greenish-brown.

headline.main: Texas Road Trip, Part I: Barbecue, Dr Pepper and Tortilla-Tossing
